pages.text: Vault Gear can be recycled into $(l)small$() amounts of resources.$(br2)It may reward $(l)Vault Scrap$(), $(l)Magnetite$(), $(l)Trinket Scrap$() or other materials, depending on the gear variant smelted.$(br2)$(l)Unidentified$() Vault Gear can also be recycled.

pages.title: Vault Recycler
pages.text: This is done in the Vault Recycler.$(br2)The more $(l)durability$() of the Vault Gear has been lowered, the $(l)lower$() the number of $(l)materials$() gained from recycling.
